analysis.key_quote: Whatever you choose to call it -- "Scheduled Policy/Career" or “Schedule F” -- would be a radical and destructive break from the vital principles of merit and stability that have made our system of government the envy of the world.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its potential harm to merit and stability in government, emphasizing the importance of nonpartisan governance and the risks of politicization, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
